name: MeebÜ WeebÜ
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 45, play as a MeebÜ WeebÜ and explore the island of mystery that feels all too familiar....

* Follow checklist items in order to avoid any unidentified bugs *

* Hover mouse over fish shadow to begin catch processs *

Controls

  • wasd - move
  • q/w - rotate camera
  • mouse drag - rotate camera
  • c - pickup items
  • x - dig/fill
  • h - pickup hat
  • f - fish / hover mouse over fish shadow to catch
  • b - bait
